Redcliffe
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mackintosh, Charles Rennie (Scottish architect, designer, and painter, 1868-1928) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Immature Mackintosh for his cousin James Hamilton. Symmetrical double villa with massive outer bay windows, smaller inner bays beneath swept-down slate roof, on brackets. Coarse red ashlar, polished dressings, stone mullions, small-pane upper sashes, leaded at No 140. Wrought-iron gates and railings to low boundary wall.(http://www.scotlandsplaces.gov.uk/search_item/index.php?service=RCAHMS&id=169356) [work]
Mackintosh's first executed design, built by George Collier.(http://www.scottisharchitects.org.uk/building_full.php?id=207812) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
dwellings
